title: @Riot Its that time, fellas
body:
Seeing as how pretty much no one can populate a full game without a DC, I think its about that time you just bring the whole system down instead of getting all your players enraged over things not working despite being able to queue for games.  

Perhaps a server reset?

Not sure what the issue is but letting people ocntinue to queue and not get a game but get all the penalties of a DC is probably worse for business than simply saying to your players "Sorry guys, no games for a few hours while we sort this problem out."

-K

replies.body:
Thanks for bringing this to our attention! As soon as we realized there was an issue, we disabled ranked play to help prevent more empty matches from multiple disconnects. Rest assured that we're working to remedy any effects this may have had on our players. While the issue should be solved by now, you can keep updated on the progress on our post [**here**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/3Lmbjp8Y-3132017-na-server-issues).

Thanks for staying patient with us!

It's great you are aware of and have mostly fixed the connection issues; but what are you doing about compensating the hundreds or even thousands of players that have lost LP, promos, etc? The problem persisted now for about 12 hours -- the whole day -- and not once was loss prevention enabled. Where is the compensation for those of us who had our time and efforts wasted and lost a lot of ranked game progress due to an error on your end?
It certainly seems to reason they should enable remake on every game mode, can't play anything without having 3+ afk, just tried aram, they had 5, we had 2.
